settings.title: Join the Team
settings.subtitle: Fairway and Greene brings tradition together with sensibility and we’re always looking for the right team members to celebrate and elevate that vision.

settings.title: Full Time Store Sales Associate
settings.text:
Raleigh, NC (Office)

As we expand our brick-and-mortar presence, Johnnie-O is looking for a tech-savvy, hands-on problem solver to help us lay the foundation for a scalable, reliable retail IT infrastructure. This is a new role at Johnnie-O, which means you’ll be responsible for everything from standing up POS systems and store networks to creating standard operating procedures that will help us grow smarter and faster. This role will be based out of our Raleigh, NC office with travel required when necessary.
settings.text1:
Los Angeles, CA (Showroom)

As Johnnie-O continues to innovate in the retail space, we are seeking a dynamic showroom manager who can enhance our customer experience through strategic visual merchandising and exceptional service. This role is pivotal in showcasing our latest collections and requires a keen eye for design and detail. The showroom manager will work closely with the marketing team to develop promotional strategies and events that attract and engage our clientele. This position will be based in our Los Angeles showroom with occasional travel to other locations for special events.
settings.text2:
Austin, TX (Warehouse)

To support our growing logistics needs, Johnnie-O is on the lookout for an operations coordinator to streamline our warehouse processes. This role will involve overseeing inventory management, coordinating shipments, and ensuring the smooth operation of daily tasks. The ideal candidate will possess strong organizational skills and a passion for efficiency, as they will play a crucial role in maintaining our supply chain's integrity. This position will be located in Austin, TX and may require flexibility for overtime during peak seasons.
